Years of US counterterrorism hostilities:

2014 – 2021

This map focuses on the use of military force for counterterrorism. The majority of such hostilities have been conducted under the 2001 Authorization for the Use of Military Force (2001 AUMF). This report does not attempt to comprehensively review the entirety of the United States’ post-9/11 wars and thus does not examine the Iraq War (2003-2011), the extensive direct action the United States has undertaken in Afghanistan for counter-insurgency, or covert action operations.

properties.mc-interactivity-template:
Iraq

Years of US counterterrorism hostilities:

2014 – 2021

This report focuses on the use of military force for counterterrorism. The majority of such hostilities have been conducted under the 2001 Authorization for the Use of Military Force (2001 AUMF). This report does not attempt to comprehensively review the entirety of the United States’ post-9/11 wars and thus does not examine the Iraq War (2003-2011), the extensive direct action the United States has undertaken in Afghanistan for counter-insurgency, or covert action operations.
